channel.title: Simple question (please help)
channel.description: where do i change the name of the bank in PI because i cant find it anywhere in the source client or cache... im using icyscape thank you

item.title: Simple question (please help)
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

search for

public void openUpDepBox() {

in the client class and you will see

sendFrame126("The Bank of Icey Realm - Deposit Box", 7421);

change to what you want

then search for

public void LoadChangedText()

and when u scroll a bit down you will see this:

changeText126("We hope you enjoyed", 2450);
		changeText126("Playing Icy Realm", 2451);
		changeText126("Please return soon.", 2452);
		changeText126("Click here to logout", 2458);
		changeText126("The Bank of Icy Realm", 5383);
		changeText126("Bank of Icy Realm", 14923);

change to what you want

btw this is battlescape I think, not PI

Read full topic
